create_access_code.name: Create access code
create_access_code.description: Create a new access code on a Kwikset smart lock.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Kwikset lock device to create the access code on.

code.name: Code
code.description: A 4 to 8 digit numeric access code.

name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the access code (e.g., 'Dog Walker').

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: Slot index on the lock (0 = auto-assign next available). Range: 0-255.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: When the code is active: all_day (always), date_range, weekly, one_time_unlimited, one_time_24_hour.

start_time.name: Start time
start_time.description: Start time for date_range or weekly schedules (HH:MM format).

end_time.name: End time
end_time.description: End time for date_range or weekly schedules (HH:MM format).

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: Start date for date_range schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format).

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: End date for date_range schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format).

days_of_week.name: Days of week
days_of_week.description: Active days for weekly schedule (e.g., monday, wednesday, friday).

edit_access_code.name: Edit access code
edit_access_code.description: Edit an existing access code on a Kwikset smart lock.

code.name: Code
code.description: The updated numeric access code (4-8 digits).

name.name: Name
name.description: The updated friendly name for the access code.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: The slot index the code occupies on the lock (0-255).

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: The updated schedule type for the access code.

disable_access_code.name: Disable access code
disable_access_code.description: Disable an existing access code on a Kwikset smart lock by slot number. If the code was created through Home Assistant, stored details are used automatically. For codes created outside HA, provide code, name, and schedule_type.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: The slot index the code occupies on the lock (0-255).

code.name: Code
code.description: Optional. The numeric access code. Required only if the code was not created through Home Assistant.

name.name: Name
name.description: Optional. Override the stored friendly name.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: Optional. Override the stored schedule type.

enable_access_code.name: Enable access code
enable_access_code.description: Re-enable a previously disabled access code on a Kwikset smart lock by slot number. If the code was created through Home Assistant, stored details are used automatically. For codes created outside HA, provide code, name, and schedule_type.

code.name: Code
code.description: Optional. The numeric access code. Required only if the code was not created through Home Assistant.

name.name: Name
name.description: Optional. Override the stored friendly name.

schedule_type.name: Schedule type
schedule_type.description: Optional. Override the stored schedule type.

delete_access_code.name: Delete access code
delete_access_code.description: Delete a specific access code from a Kwikset smart lock by its slot number.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: Slot index of the access code to delete (0-255).

delete_all_access_codes.name: Delete all access codes
delete_all_access_codes.description: Delete all access codes from a Kwikset smart lock. This action cannot be undone.

list_access_codes.name: List access codes
list_access_codes.description: List all known access codes on a Kwikset smart lock, including codes managed through Home Assistant and codes detected from the lock.

invite_user.name: Invite user
invite_user.description: Invite a new user to your Kwikset home with a specified access level.

config_entry_id.name: Config entry
config_entry_id.description: The Kwikset integration config entry for the home.

email.name: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to invite.

access_level.name: Access level
access_level.description: Access level for the user: Member or Admin.

nickname.name: Nickname
nickname.description: A friendly name for the invited user.

allowed_devices.name: Allowed devices
allowed_devices.description: The Kwikset lock devices the user is allowed to access.

access_time_type.name: Access time type
access_time_type.description: Type of time-based access restriction: date_range for a fixed period, or weekly for a recurring schedule.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: Start date for date range access (YYYY-MM-DD).

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: End date for date range access (YYYY-MM-DD).

start_time.name: Start time
start_time.description: Daily start time for weekly access (HH:MM:SS).

end_time.name: End time
end_time.description: Daily end time for weekly access (HH:MM:SS).

days.name: Days
days.description: Days of the week for weekly access (e.g., Mon, Tue, Wed).

update_user.name: Update user
update_user.description: Update an existing user's access level or permissions in your Kwikset home.

config_entry_id.name: Config entry
config_entry_id.description: The Kwikset integration config entry for the home.

email.name: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to update.

access_level.name: Access level
access_level.description: Updated access level: Member or Admin.

allowed_devices.name: Allowed devices
allowed_devices.description: The Kwikset lock devices the user is allowed to access.

access_time_type.name: Access time type
access_time_type.description: Type of time-based access restriction: date_range for a fixed period, or weekly for a recurring schedule.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: Start date for date range access (YYYY-MM-DD).

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: End date for date range access (YYYY-MM-DD).

start_time.name: Start time
start_time.description: Daily start time for weekly access (HH:MM:SS).

end_time.name: End time
end_time.description: Daily end time for weekly access (HH:MM:SS).

days.name: Days
days.description: Days of the week for weekly access (e.g., Mon, Tue, Wed).

delete_user.name: Delete user
delete_user.description: Remove a user from your Kwikset home.

config_entry_id.name: Config entry
config_entry_id.description: The Kwikset integration config entry for the home.

email.name: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to remove.

list_users.name: List users
list_users.description: List all users who have access to your Kwikset home.

config_entry_id.name: Config entry
config_entry_id.description: The Kwikset integration config entry for the home.

user.title: Se connecter à Kwikset
user.description: Entrez vos identifiants de compte Kwikset pour connecter vos serrures intelligentes.

data.save_password: Enregistrer le mot de passe pour la réauthentification automatique

data_description.email: L'adresse e-mail utilisée pour votre compte Kwikset
data_description.password: Le mot de passe de votre compte Kwikset
data_description.save_password: Si activé, votre mot de passe sera enregistré pour vous réauthentifier automatiquement lorsque votre session expire. Sinon, vous devrez vous réauthentifier manuellement.

select_home.title: Sélectionner la maison
select_home.description: Choisissez quelle maison Kwikset configurer. Chaque maison sera configurée comme une entrée d'intégration séparée.

data_description.conf_home_id: Sélectionnez la maison Kwikset contenant vos serrures intelligentes

reauth_confirm.title: Réauthentification requise
reauth_confirm.description: L'intégration Kwikset doit réauthentifier votre compte. Veuillez entrer vos identifiants.

data.save_password: Enregistrer le mot de passe pour la réauthentification automatique

data_description.email: L'adresse e-mail utilisée pour votre compte Kwikset
data_description.password: Le mot de passe de votre compte Kwikset
data_description.save_password: Si activé, votre mot de passe sera enregistré pour vous réauthentifier automatiquement lorsque votre session expire. Sinon, vous devrez vous réauthentifier manuellement.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigurer Kwikset
reconfigure.description: Entrez vos identifiants de compte Kwikset pour actualiser l'authentification et découvrir de nouveaux appareils.

data.save_password: Enregistrer le mot de passe pour la réauthentification automatique

data_description.password: Le mot de passe de votre compte Kwikset
data_description.save_password: Si activé, votre mot de passe sera enregistré pour vous réauthentifier automatiquement lorsque votre session expire. Sinon, vous devrez vous réauthentifier manuellement.

mfa.title: Authentification multifacteur
mfa.description: Entrez le code de vérification de votre {mfa_type}.

data_description.mfa_code: Le code à 6 chiffres envoyé à votre appareil

mfa_reauth.title: Authentification multifacteur
mfa_reauth.description: Entrez le code de vérification de votre {mfa_type} pour terminer la réauthentification.

data_description.mfa_code: Le code à 6 chiffres envoyé à votre appareil

custom_challenge_delivery.title: Verification Code Delivery
custom_challenge_delivery.description: Choose how you would like to receive your verification code.

data_description.delivery_method: Select whether to receive the code via email or SMS

custom_challenge_delivery_reauth.title: Verification Code Delivery
custom_challenge_delivery_reauth.description: Choose how you would like to receive your verification code.

mfa_reconfigure.description: Entrez le code de vérification de votre {mfa_type} pour terminer la reconfiguration.

custom_challenge_delivery_reconfigure.description: Choose how you would like to receive your verification code.

data_description.delivery_method: Select whether to receive the code via email or SMS

error.invalid_mfa: Code de vérification invalide. Veuillez réessayer.
error.token_expired: Le jeton d'authentification a expiré. Veuillez vous reconnecter.
error.user_not_found: Account not found. Please verify your email address is correct and that you have an active Kwikset account.
error.user_not_confirmed: Your account has not been confirmed. Please check your email for a confirmation link from Kwikset.

abort.reconfigure_successful: Intégration rechargée avec succès. Les nouveaux appareils apparaîtront sous peu.
abort.no_available_homes: Aucune maison disponible à configurer. Toutes les maisons sont déjà configurées ou vous n'avez aucune maison dans votre compte Kwikset.
abort.user_not_found: Account not found. Please verify your email address is correct and that you have an active Kwikset account.
abort.user_not_confirmed: Your account has not been confirmed. Please check your email for a confirmation link from Kwikset.

data_description.refresh_interval: Fréquence d'interrogation du cloud Kwikset pour l'état de l'appareil (30-900 secondes). Des valeurs plus basses fournissent des mises à jour plus rapides mais peuvent augmenter la charge de l'API et réduire la durée de vie de la batterie.

auth_failed.message: Échec de l'authentification. Veuillez vérifier vos identifiants et réessayer.

connection_error.message: Impossible de se connecter au service cloud Kwikset. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

token_refresh_failed.message: Échec du rafraîchissement du jeton d'authentification. Veuillez vous réauthentifier.

lock_failed.message: Échec du verrouillage de l'appareil. L'appareil peut être hors ligne ou il peut y avoir un problème de connectivité temporaire. Veuillez réessayer.

unlock_failed.message: Échec du déverrouillage de l'appareil. L'appareil peut être hors ligne ou il peut y avoir un problème de connectivité temporaire. Veuillez réessayer.

switch_on_failed.message: Échec de l'activation du paramètre. Veuillez réessayer.

switch_off_failed.message: Échec de la désactivation du paramètre. Veuillez réessayer.

device_offline.message: L'appareil semble être hors ligne. Veuillez vérifier que la serrure est alimentée et connectée à votre réseau WiFi.

api_error.message: Une erreur s'est produite lors de la communication avec le service Kwikset. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

websocket_subscription_failed.message: Real-time event subscription failed for {email}. Falling back to polling.

edit_access_code_failed.message: Failed to edit access code on the lock. The device may be offline or the slot may be invalid. Please try again.

create_access_code_failed.message: Failed to create access code on the lock. The device may be offline or the code may be invalid. Please try again.

disable_access_code_failed.message: Failed to disable access code. The device may be offline or the slot may be invalid. Please try again.

enable_access_code_failed.message: Failed to enable access code. The device may be offline or the slot may be invalid. Please try again.

delete_access_code_failed.message: Failed to delete access code. The device may be offline or the slot may be invalid. Please try again.

delete_all_access_codes_failed.message: Failed to delete all access codes. The device may be offline. Please try again.

device_not_found.message: Device not found: {device_id}. Please verify the device ID is correct.

device_not_kwikset.message: Device {device_id} is not a Kwikset lock device.

device_not_loaded.message: Device {device_id} is not currently loaded. The integration may need to be reloaded.

invalid_schedule_params.message: Invalid schedule parameters. Date range schedules require start_date and end_date. Weekly schedules require days_of_week.

access_code_not_tracked.message: Access code at slot {slot} was not created through Home Assistant and no code was provided. Provide the code, name, and schedule_type fields to disable or enable codes not managed by HA.

cannot_delete_last_access_code.message: Impossible de supprimer le dernier code d'accès. Chaque serrure doit avoir au moins un code d'accès. Ajoutez un autre code avant de supprimer celui-ci.

cannot_delete_all_access_codes.message: Impossible de supprimer tous les codes d'accès. Chaque serrure doit avoir au moins un code d'accès. Utilisez le service de suppression individuelle des codes d'accès.

invite_user_failed.message: Failed to invite user. Please check the email address and try again.

update_user_failed.message: Failed to update user. The user may not exist or there may be a connectivity issue. Please try again.

delete_user_failed.message: Failed to remove user. The user may not exist or there may be a connectivity issue. Please try again.

list_users_failed.message: Failed to retrieve user list. Please check your connection and try again.

config_entry_not_found.message: Config entry not found. Please verify the config entry ID is correct.

config_entry_not_loaded.message: Config entry is not loaded. The integration may need to be reloaded.

missing_date_range_fields.message: Date range access requires both start_date and end_date to be provided.

missing_weekly_fields.message: Weekly access requires start_time, end_time, and days to be provided.

device_offline.title: Appareil hors ligne : {device_name}
device_offline.description:
La serrure **{device_name}** semble être hors ligne. Cela pourrait être dû à :

- Batterie faible
- Problèmes de connectivité WiFi
- Appareil hors de portée

Veuillez vérifier l'appareil et vous assurer qu'il a de l'alimentation et une connectivité WiFi.

auth_failed.title: Authentification requise
auth_failed.description: L'intégration Kwikset doit se réauthentifier. Allez dans **Paramètres → Appareils et services → Kwikset** et cliquez sur **Reconfigurer** pour mettre à jour vos identifiants.

confirm.title: Réauthentifier Kwikset
confirm.description:
Les jetons d'authentification pour l'intégration Kwikset (**{entry_title}**) ont expiré et doivent être rafraîchis.

Cela se produit généralement lorsque :
- Les jetons ont naturellement expiré après une longue période
- Le mot de passe a été changé dans l'application Kwikset
- Le compte a été déconnecté depuis un autre appareil

Cliquez sur le bouton **Réparer** ci-dessous pour saisir à nouveau vos identifiants Kwikset.
